channel.title: How can i change max stats?
channel.description:
my max stats are [u]99[/u] with [s]185[/s] combat.. i want to change them to max stats, [u]135[/u] and max combat [s]253[/s]... if you know the code to find this to edit please tell me, i think its somewhere in playerhandler.java not sure tho please give me any informtion you know to help
:D[b]thankyou for your time![/b] :D

item.description:
@firemastr666 wrote:

look for public int getlevel look for 2 99’s change thoes and i think ur cb level geos 2 175 or so… i dunno how 2 change max level =\
